mapper.select: SELECT book.*, member.title memberTitle, time_table.hour hour FROM (SELECT shop.*, time_table.time_id, time_table.hour FROM shop, time_table) book LEFT JOIN booking ON book.table_id=booking.table_id AND book.time_id=booking.time_id LEFT JOIN member ON booking.member_id=member.id LEFT JOIN time_table ON book.time_id=time_table.time_id ORDER BY time_table.hour, book.table_id

SELECT book.*, member.title memberTitle, time_table.hour hour FROM (SELECT shop.*, time_table.time_id, time_table.hour FROM shop, time_table WHERE shop.member_id=#{id} AND time_table.member_id=#{id}) book LEFT JOIN booking ON book.table_id=booking.table_id AND book.time_id=booking.time_id LEFT JOIN member ON booking.member_id=member.id LEFT JOIN time_table ON book.time_id=time_table.time_id ORDER BY time_table.hour, book.table_id
